website_summaries.verdict: One of the most popular ice cream mixes out there — and for good reason. Top marks for taste and consistency.
pros: Consumers had good results experimenting with different milks (like almond) and adding fruit to the mix
cons: Powder in the package can be quite hard to break up

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Taste like vanilla but not worth the price at all. Honestly, it's like a pudding
customer_reviews.author: Cp

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t make much
customer_reviews.text: Taste amazing. But like the other reviews barely makes any ice cream. You would need at least 4 packages to make a 1/2 gallon
customer_reviews.author: tulip204

customer_reviews.title: Home made flavor still beats
customer_reviews.text: It's EASY and FAST. I added some extras like chocolate chips and flavoring and it was ok. My husband couldn't stop eating it. I still like home made from scratch better.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Hyer

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: This product is not so good. Very pasty pudding like texture. Probably one of the worst premade mixes I've tried. I'm not a fan, Triple scoop is so much better or made from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Order not complete.
customer_reviews.text: Product was just like I remembered as a child ! Very good. Problem being there was only one vanilla and one dark chocolate when delivered. Hope this will be corrected. Thought the other 2 would come later. If it was not so good, I would not worry about it. Concerned that I won’t receive my full order , if I reorder.
customer_reviews.author: susan sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Bland alone but ok in a milkshake
customer_reviews.text: Easy to prepare, but it lacked flavor. Tasted like frozen whipped cream. Not what I remembered as a child.
customer_reviews.author: LDStreeter

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate rocks!
customer_reviews.text: I give 4 stars because of the vanilla which is just average. The chocolate is awesome and would be a 5 star on its own
customer_reviews.author: Lesleah

customer_reviews.title: Good product if a bit on the expensive side.
customer_reviews.text: They're good mixes but can usually be found a bit cheaper in store.
customer_reviews.author: G M

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It works well but I found it in my local grocery store for just a little over a dollar a box so I won't be buying again. It's a poor value
customer_reviews.author: chipmunk53

customer_reviews.title: I received the product and the chocolate was fine, but the vanilla powder was hardened and could ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the product and the chocolate was fine, but the vanilla powder was hardened and could not be used. So half of the order was bad. This is the second time we have ordered and the first time all was good. But disappointed in the reordered items.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Easy Ice Cream Mix
customer_reviews.text: This mix is very easy to use, and makes great ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: snuggumspuss

customer_reviews.title: Have been very very pleased with the vanilla flavor
customer_reviews.text: Have been very very pleased with the vanilla flavor. Easy to use and works great in the soft serve ice cream machine.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Ann Hay

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Put in ice cream maker that didn't freeze it so we put it in the freezer and it tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Cool stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great flavored soft ice creams. Mix it early and keep it in the frig for a few hours after mixing or it seems a little too soft.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ice cream mix was just ok. Probably won't buy again...
customer_reviews.author: BeverlyB

customer_reviews.title: rival has a much better
customer_reviews.text: didnt care too much for this product,rival has a much better product
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It was like ice cream store flavor
customer_reviews.text: It was like ice cream store flavor, the recipe in the book that came with machine was way better....
customer_reviews.author: MiChelle Brown

customer_reviews.title: Just a great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this ice cream mix i've been using it for many many years love it
customer_reviews.author: alanda white

customer_reviews.title: We tried them out and they was great.
customer_reviews.text: This was for Christmas gift. We tried them out and they was great.
customer_reviews.author: Real truth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Should have read it better I guess really small bummer
customer_reviews.author: kassy

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It’s really hard to make ice cream out of it, I used a ice cream maker but it doesn’t turn out good
customer_reviews.author: Zhifeng wang

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a big fan of ice cream. But ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big fan of ice cream. But this kind was out of this world i bought my mom a ice cream maker for her birthday and this was what was what came up with it! It's a must try!
customer_reviews.author: Torre Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i only received one box of each with my order
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Recieve My Whole Order
customer_reviews.text: I only recieved 1 box of each flavor. The description says a 4 pack with 2 of each flavor, but I did not receive that. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, especially the vanilla flavor. Use this in my kitchen aid mixer and it comes out great. Good flavor and no nasty aftertaste. Nice and smooth on the tongue
customer_reviews.author: jean gambardello

customer_reviews.title: Maybe if they were all good....
customer_reviews.text: Some of the items I received were rock hard like they'd gotten wet and been stored a long time. The ones that weren't like this made good ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: WitchyWoods76

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate is so good! Will update when we try the vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: From a Kid to a Senior Citizen
customer_reviews.text: Ice Cream was reasonably priced, packed well and delivered in a timely manner. It's extremely easy to make ( mom always used Table Cream ) and it was...still is a staple of our Christmas family gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mohr

product_meta.title: Junket Ice Cream Mix Bundle - 2 Vanilla and 2 Chocolate (4 Total)
product_meta.description:
Make homemade ice cream quickly and easily with All Natural Junket Ice Cream Mix. Enjoy the delicious simplicity of creamy Very Vanilla Ice Cream and the smoothly rich and decadent flavor of Dutch Chocolate. You could also add your own touch by mixing in nuts, candy or toppings. Gluten free, Junket Ice Cream mix is indulgent, wholesome fun. With this bundle you’ll get two flavors, Very Vanilla and Dutch Chocolate (two boxes each); for your buying convenience. The boxes also feature two sets of directions on the back, one that requires an ice cream maker, and one that does not. 

Very Vanilla Ingredients: Sugar, dried corn syrup, non-fat milk powder, guar gum, carrageenan and gum arabic, natural vanilla flavor with other natural flavors. Contains milk products. 

Dutch Chocolate Ingredients: Sugar, dutched cocoa, dried corn syrup, non-fat milk powder, guar gum, carrageenan and gum arabic. Contains milk products and soy lecithin.
feature_bullets: This bundle contains two Very Vanilla and two Dutch Chocolate (4 oz. boxes)
A convenient bundle of 4 boxes - 2 of each flavor
Each 4 oz. box makes 1 quart of ice cream
Can be made with or without an ice cream maker
All natural, preservative and gluten free ingredients
